T02D2540:145a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti panytsi k'a /
T02D2540:145a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dka' 'grel /

T02D2540:145a-37: gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste de yang dag

T02D2540:146b-32: rje phreng ba mtha' yas pa nyid du bstan to

T02D2540:148a-21: che ba'i bdag nyid can kun du bzang po'i rang

T02D2540:148a-23: de'i phyir mtshungs med ni mnyam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:148a-24: zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2540:148a-31: pa'i tshig la sogs pa'i dbye bas yang dag pa

T02D2540:148a-35: nges par rab tu gsal ba nyid du mdzad par
T02D2540:148a-36: rig par gsungs pa 'das pa'i zhes pa la sogs
T02D2540:148a-37: pa ste / dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas

T02D2540:148a-39: gshegs pa khyod kyis kyang rtag tu ston par mdzad

T02D2540:148b-0: ba'i don bya @148b ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2540:148b-1: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D2540:148b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gis gsungs pa ma

T02D2540:148b-4: sogs pa ste / rdo rje 'chang chen po de

T02D2540:148b-6: sogs pa ste / // 'dir sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i

T02D2540:148b-21: zhes pa nges par 'byung ba'i mthar thug pa'o //

T02D2540:148b-29: thugs ro gcig tu gyur ba de 'dzin par byed

T02D2540:148b-31: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba

T02D2540:148b-33: gzung bar bgyi'o zhes dgongs pa'o //

T02D2540:148b-38: rnams kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes

T02D2540:148b-41: pa dang las dang skye bas kun nas nyon mongs

T02D2540:149a-2: de sel ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /

T02D2540:149a-21: las zangs kyi kha dog la sogs pa skyes bu

T02D2540:149a-23: nyid kyi zhal nas te rdzu 'phrul gyis sems sems

T02D2540:149a-25: // bsod nams kyi tshogs mang po las nges par

T02D2540:149a-31: cad la mi slu zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i
T02D2540:149a-32: chos ston pa nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don to
T02D2540:149a-34: nyid kyi ljags brkyang ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi
T02D2540:149a-35: 'dzum pa bstan pa yang mdzad par blta bar bya
T02D2540:149a-36: ste / 'dzum pa ji lta bu zhig ce na gsungs pa /

T02D2540:149b-0: @149b lus dang ngag dang sems rnal 'byor du gnas

T02D2540:149b-8: yang 'dzum pa ci lta bur gyur pas she na /

T02D2540:149b-10: bdud bzhi ni phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang

T02D2540:150a-35: dga' dang tshim pa'i rnam par blta //
T02D2540:150a-36: tshig gi bdud rtsi 'thung ba bzhin //

T02D2540:150a-40: bkur sti byas te chos mnyan bya //

T02D2540:150a-45: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs //
T02D2540:150b-0: sh'akya'i rigs @150b las byung ba'i phyir sh'akya yang 'di
T02D2540:150b-1: yin la sku dang gsung dang thugs thub pa'i brtul
T02D2540:150b-2: zhugs dang ldan pa thub pa yang 'di yin pas
T02D2540:150b-4: mchog gi dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //

T02D2540:150b-8: pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med

T02D2540:150b-12: // mtha' dag ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang
T02D2540:150b-13: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gtogs pa la sogs pa
T02D2540:150b-15: sngags rnams kyi rigs ni rgyud ces chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D2540:150b-16: de dang dbyer mi phyed kyang brjod bya'i chos rnams
T02D2540:150b-17: kyi dbye bas phye ba'i nye bar brtag pa gsungs

T02D2540:150b-22: 'chang ba ste gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i
T02D2540:150b-24: de rnams kyi rigs ni rgyud do //

T02D2540:150b-26: rigs gsum zhes pa sku gsung thugs kyi rigs te

T02D2540:154b-10: dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du //

T02D2540:154b-12: de bzhin du ni 'jig par brjod //
T02D2540:154b-14: gang de ltar yang med par gyur pa de la ni /
T02D2540:154b-15: 'dir gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin dang de las gzhan pa'ang ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2540:154b-16: des na 'di khong du chud cing rig par srid
T02D2540:154b-17: pa gsum gyi dngos po ma lus pa so sor
T02D2540:154b-18: snang ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2540:154b-19: // de ltar sgyu ma lta bu'i chos kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:154b-20: rgyud dag par gyur pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams
T02D2540:154b-21: kyang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa la
T02D2540:154b-22: sogs pa'i rim gyis shes rab phul du byung bar
T02D2540:154b-23: gyur te / shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la nye bar brtson ba rnams kyi phyir /
T02D2540:154b-24: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po drug dang ldan pa'i aa
T02D2540:154b-25: yig la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa
T02D2540:154b-26: / aa a'a zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:154b-27: thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog par
T02D2540:154b-28: byed pa'i dbyangs bcu gnyis kyis ni ka yig la
T02D2540:154b-29: sogs pa'i ngo bo sum cu rtsa bzhi gsal bar
T02D2540:154b-30: byed pa ste / chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid yongs su snang bar byed pa'o //
T02D2540:154b-31: de rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'i gsang sngags
T02D2540:154b-32: kyi lha rnams ni shes rab kyi 'khor lor bsgom
T02D2540:154b-33: par bya ste / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
T02D2540:154b-34: med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir
T02D2540:154b-36: de las dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa
T02D2540:154b-37: so sor rtogs par bya ba'i don du dbyangs bcu
T02D2540:154b-38: gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2540:154b-39: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis la
T02D2540:154b-40: goms pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa na rnam par
T02D2540:154b-41: smin par gyur pa'i sems kyi khyad par bcu gnyis
T02D2540:154b-42: ni sa rnams te lung las bklag par bya'o //
T02D2540:155a-1: aa zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa la
T02D2540:155a-2: sogs pa don dam pa byang chub kyi sems rnam
T02D2540:155a-3: par thar pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin mos pas spyod
T02D2540:155a-4: pa'i sa ste / byang chub kyi sems rnam par
T02D2540:155a-5: dag pa so sor rtogs par byed cing rin chen
T02D2540:155a-6: padma'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mtshon par byed
T02D2540:155a-7: pa'i sa ste / pa'o // a'a zhes bya ba
T02D2540:155a-8: ni chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan
T02D2540:155a-9: nyid can sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab
T02D2540:155a-10: kyi mthar phyin pa gsal bar byed cing rab tu
T02D2540:155a-11: dga' ba'i sa mtshon par yang byed do //
T02D2540:155a-12: ai zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rtog pa dang
T02D2540:155a-13: bral ba'i phyir sdom pa dang chos yang dag par
T02D2540:155a-14: sdud pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan
T02D2540:155a-15: nyid can tshul khrims kyi phra rol tu phyin pa
T02D2540:155a-16: la lhag par spyod pa gsal bar byed cing dri
T02D2540:155a-17: ma med pa'i sa mtshon par yang byed do //
T02D2540:155a-18: a'i zhes bya ba ni 'di'i yan lag dang nying
T02D2540:155a-19: lag bcad kyang bzod par byed pas sdug bsngal la
T02D2540:155a-20: ji mi snyam pa dang gzhan gyis gnod pa byas
T02D2540:155a-21: pa la bzod pa dang chos la nges par sems
T02D2540:155a-22: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu
T02D2540:155a-23: phyin pa lhag par spyod pa gsal bar byed cing
T02D2540:155a-24: 'od byed pa'i sa mtshon par yang byed do //
T02D2540:155a-25: au zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang mes
T02D2540:155a-26: kyi rigs kyi chos tshogs rab tu sgrub pa dang
T02D2540:155a-27: / sems can gyi don gyis rjes su bcings pa dang /
T02D2540:155a-28: sangs rgyas zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste /
T02D2540:155a-29: rnam pa gsum la spro ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2540:155a-30: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag
T02D2540:155a-31: par spyod pa gsal par byed cing 'od 'phro ba
T02D2540:155a-32: can gyi sa mtshon par yang byed do //
T02D2540:155a-33: a'u zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad lhag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:155a-36: rnam par 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum dang
T02D2540:155a-37: ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2540:155a-38: la lhag par spyod pa gsal par byed cing shin
T02D2540:155a-39: tu sbyang dka' ba'i sa yang mtshon par byed do
T02D2540:155a-40: // ae zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu rnyog
T02D2540:155a-41: pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad
T02D2540:155a-42: ni zhi ba'o zhes khyod du chud de /
T02D2540:155a-43: thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung
T02D2540:155a-44: ba'i shes rab rnam pa gsum la lhag par spyod
T02D2540:155a-45: pa gsal bar byed cing mngon du gyur pa'i sa
T02D2540:155b-0: @155b aee zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu lhun
T02D2540:155b-1: gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la
T02D2540:155b-2: 'jug pa'i phyir rang gi skyon spong ba dang /
T02D2540:155b-3: sems can gyi don la 'jug pa dang /
T02D2540:155b-4: myur du mngon par byang chub par byed pa'i mtshan
T02D2540:155b-5: nyid rnam gsum dang ldan pa'i thabs kyi pha rol
T02D2540:155b-6: tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa rab tu
T02D2540:155b-7: rtogs par byed cing ring du song ba'i sa yang
T02D2540:155b-9: ao yig ni rnam par rtog pa'i chu bo las
T02D2540:155b-10: rgal ba nyid kyi tshogs rab tu sgrub pa dang
T02D2540:155b-11: / sems can gyi don byed pa dang /
T02D2540:155b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste mtshan
T02D2540:155b-13: nyid rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i smon lam gyi
T02D2540:155b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag pa nas mngon
T02D2540:155b-15: par gsal bar byed cing mi g-yo ba'i sa mtshon
T02D2540:155b-17: aoo yig ni dpe las 'das pa'i chos can smra
T02D2540:155b-18: ba po nyid kyis las zlog par byed pa dang
T02D2540:155b-19: nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa dang bdud dang
T02D2540:155b-20: phas kyi rgol ba zlog par byed pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2540:155b-21: rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i stobs kyi pha rol
T02D2540:155b-22: tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa nyid 'chad
T02D2540:155b-23: par byed cing sa legs pa'i blo gros mtshon par
T02D2540:155b-24: yang byed do // aam zhes bya ba ni byang
T02D2540:155b-25: chub sems dpa'i sa'i mthar son pa nyid kyis rnam
T02D2540:155b-26: par rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa
T02D2540:155b-27: med pa'i mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang
T02D2540:155b-28: yang byed do // / sems can gyi don bya
T02D2540:155b-29: ba'i thabs la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2540:155b-30: rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi pha
T02D2540:155b-31: rol tu phyin pa rab kyi mthar son pa nyid
T02D2540:155b-32: rnam par 'byed par byed cing chos kyi sprin gyis
T02D2540:155b-34: / aa:zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D2540:155b-35: pa nyid kyi ye shes snang ba'i ngo bo g-yo
T02D2540:155b-36: ba med cing mi phyed pa gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2540:155b-37: de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs
T02D2540:155b-38: pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu
T02D2540:155b-39: phyin pa rab kyi mthar son pa lhag par rtogs
T02D2540:155b-40: pa nyid kyis bya ba byas pa'i phyir sems can
T02D2540:155b-41: gyi don gyi bya ba mtha' dag la lhun gyis
T02D2540:155b-42: grub pas gsal bar 'jug pa dang /
T02D2540:155b-43: kun du 'od sangs rgyas kyi sa mtshon par yang byed pa yin no //
T02D2540:155b-44: pha rol tu phyin ba bcu gnyis rdang sa bcu
T02D2540:155b-45: gnyis po rnams kyang dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis
T02D2540:156a-1: pa'i shes rab kyi 'khor lor kun nas phyi'i mu khyud thams cad la te /
T02D2540:156a-2: de yang phyi rol du ni ka la sogs pa nas ksha'i mthar thug par sbyar ro //
T02D2540:156a-3: de la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'i lte ba la mu:aom zhes pa yi ge gsum mo //
T02D2540:156a-4: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la g-yas skor gyis
T02D2540:156a-5: badzra t'ikshna la sogs pa'i gsang sngas drug sbyar bar
T02D2540:156a-6: bya'o // thams cad kyang kha dog dkar po lus
T02D2540:156a-7: thams cad snang bar byed pa snying gar zla ba'i
T02D2540:156a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2540:156a-9: rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su aom /
T02D2540:156a-11: rgyab tu hr'i: g-yas su aam /
T02D2540:156a-13: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su rim pas /
T02D2540:156a-19: aa ra pa tsa n'a ya /
T02D2540:156a-25: dharma dh'a tu w'a g'i shva r'a ya zhes pa
T02D2540:156a-26: sangs bcu gnyis po'i dang por ao yig dang na
T02D2540:156a-27: ma:zhes bya ba mthar bsam par bya ste /
T02D2540:156a-28: 'khor lo de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D2540:156a-29: snying po can sa bcu gnyis dang pha rol tu
T02D2540:156a-30: phyin pa bcu gnyis dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
T02D2540:156a-31: ba yan lag bcu gnyis te /
T02D2540:156a-32: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad bsags pa rnam
T02D2540:156a-33: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes snang
T02D2540:156a-34: ba'i ngo bo de snying gar zla ba'i steng du
T02D2540:156a-36: de las byung ba'i dkar po dang dmar po la
T02D2540:156a-37: sogs pa'i 'od kyi tshogs 'phro zhing 'thon pa rnams
T02D2540:156a-38: kyis lus kyi nang snang bar byas nas phyi rol
T02D2540:156a-39: du 'thon te mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha'i khong na
T02D2540:156a-40: gnas pa'i brten pa dang g-yo ba'i dngo spo mtha'
T02D2540:156a-41: dag rab tu gsal bar snang bar byas te /
T02D2540:156a-42: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dri ma med pa'i
T02D2540:156a-43: me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu 'od
T02D2540:156a-44: gsal bdag nyid du bsgoms pas myur ba nyid du
T02D2540:156a-45: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2540:156a-47: sthi to hri di dzny'a na m'urtti ra ham buddho buddh'a n'am /
T02D2540:156a-49: zhes pa ni dus gsum pa'i ye shes snang ba'i
T02D2540:156a-50: rang bzhin nyid kyis thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir
T02D2540:156b-0: sems can thams cad kyis nying la @156b gnas pa
T02D2540:156b-2: rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la aom /
T02D2540:156b-3: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams byu //
T02D2540:156b-7: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su /
T02D2540:156b-11: yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor o'i lte ba la /
T02D2540:156b-22: yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la dh'i /
T02D2540:156b-33: yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la aom /
T02D2540:156b-43: yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la /
T02D2540:156b-54: yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la /
T02D2540:156b-66: rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo drug po de rnams su
T02D2540:156b-67: yi ge yod pa de rnams ni shes rab lha
T02D2540:156b-68: bar bskyed pa'i phyir kha dog dkar por bsgom par
T02D2540:156b-70: da ni gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu
T02D2540:156b-71: de legs par bstan par bya'o zhes pa la sogs
T02D2540:156b-72: pas mtshan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i don yang dag
T02D2540:156b-74: bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa gnyis la brten te
T02D2540:156b-75: sgyu ma'i chos kyi nye bar bzung nas gsungs pa
T02D2540:156b-76: ni / 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:156b-77: 'di ltar gyi sgra ni kun du 'byung bar ston pa'o //
T02D2540:156b-78: yang na lan gyi skabs su zhal gyis bzhes pa gang yin pa de /
T02D2540:156b-79: de nges par bstan par bya'i zhes pa ste de ni sgra'i rim pa'i don to //
T02D2540:156b-81: bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:156b-82: sangs rgyas aa yig las byung zhes pa tshig gi don to //
T02D2540:156b-83: ci nyan thos la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin nam
T02D2540:156b-84: zhes gsungs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ste
T02D2540:156b-85: / yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:156b-89: ji ltar rgyal bas dang phyug sangs //
T02D2540:157a-2: de bzhin 'dir yang shes bya ste //
T02D2540:157a-3: des na 'di ni bcom ldan brjod //
T02D2540:157a-5: de la rgyal ba zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:157a-6: yang na phung po la sogs pa bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan no //
T02D2540:157a-7: na yig phyis pa ni nges pa'i tshig las so //
T02D2540:157a-8: dngos po'i de kho na nyid ji ltar gnas pa rtogs pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas so //
T02D2540:157a-9: rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med par yang dag
T02D2540:157a-10: par rtogs pa dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2540:157a-11: te / byed pa po nyid kyi phyir ni shshi'i rkyen can no //
T02D2540:157a-12: de yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas
T02D2540:157a-13: bu dhi la byed pa po nyid la nishth'a rab
T02D2540:157a-15: rtag pa dang ni chad pa bral //
T02D2540:157a-16: mtshon bya dang ni mtshan nyid spangs //
T02D2540:157a-17: gtso bos rmi lam sgyu sogs bzhin //
T02D2540:157a-18: 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags //
T02D2540:157a-20: aa zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos
T02D2540:157a-21: thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes pa la sogs pas dngos
T02D2540:157a-22: po'i chos rnams skyes ba med pa gnyis su med
T02D2540:157a-23: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi pha
T02D2540:157a-24: rol tu phyin pa'i sa bon las aa yig mi
T02D2540:157a-25: 'gyur ba nyid rdzogs pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu aa
T02D2540:157a-27: don dam par ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T02D2540:157a-28: gyi bcom ldan 'das aa yig las ma byung ba
T02D2540:157a-29: nyid du byung bar shes par bya zhing /
T02D2540:157a-30: des nye bar mtshon nas chos thams cad kyang yig las byung ba'o zhes rtogs par bya ste /
T02D2540:157a-31: de rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:157a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gang //
T02D2540:157a-34: 'go ba de yi rang bzhin de //
T02D2540:157a-36: de yi ge du ma las byung yang aa yig gtso bor byas pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2540:157a-37: aa yig ces pa logs pa ste /
T02D2540:157a-38: ci ltar yig 'bru kun gyi mchog yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2540:157a-39: yi ge dam pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2540:157a-40: 'di thams cad las phul du byung ba'i phyir dam pa'o //
T02D2540:157a-41: chos kyi dbyings mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yi ge'o //
T02D2540:157a-42: 'gyur ba med pa'i mchog chos kyi sku la de ltar bshad do //
T02D2540:157a-43: de las kyang sems can gyi phung po chen po'i don 'byung bas na don chen te /
T02D2540:157b-0: @157b don chen po yang yin la chos kyi sku
T02D2540:157b-1: bdag por gyur ba nyid kyang yin pas sems can
T02D2540:157b-2: rnams kyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2540:157b-4: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las rnams ni //
T02D2540:157b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa mgon po byams pas mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du rgya cher gsungs te /
T02D2540:157b-6: chos kyi sku yi phrin las ni //
T02D2540:157b-7: rnam pa nyid shu dun du bzhed //
T02D2540:157b-8: ces pa phrin las rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun po de yang rtogs par byas te /
T02D2540:157b-9: 'dir ni mngas pa 'jigs pa'i phyir mi bri'o //
T02D2540:157b-10: don chen po de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir aa yig kyang don chen po'o //
T02D2540:157b-11: sngags kyi tshul la ni aa yig ces pa mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag med do //
T02D2540:157b-12: kha dog kun gyi mchog ces pa la /
T02D2540:157b-13: dkar po dang nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog
T02D2540:157b-14: thams cad kyi mchog ni sna tshogs yin pa'i phyir
T02D2540:157b-15: kha dog kun gyi mchog ni don yod grub pa'o
T02D2540:157b-16: // don chen ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D2540:157b-17: sems can thams cad kyi don chen po gang las
T02D2540:157b-18: byung ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
T02D2540:157b-19: 'chang ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan yin pa'i phyir
T02D2540:157b-20: zhes pa'o // yi ge dam pa zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D2540:157b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i
T02D2540:157b-22: rang bzhin nyid yi ge med pas na zhes sbyar
T02D2540:157b-23: te sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2540:157b-24: de nyid ces pa sbyar te /
T02D2540:157b-25: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog / de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2540:157b-26: de nyid kun la khyab pa po //
T02D2540:157b-27: de ni lus can kun la gnas //
T02D2540:157b-28: zhes pa'i rigs pas kun la gnas zhes pa'i rigs
T02D2540:157b-29: pas gnyis su med pa'i nges shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D2540:157b-31: sngar gsungs pa'i rigs pas gdod ma nas ma skyes
T02D2540:157b-32: pa'i phyir aa yig ni skye ba med pa yin
T02D2540:157b-33: la / de las byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyang skye ba med pa'o //
T02D2540:157b-35: dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2540:157b-37: de ltar skye ba med pa la gnas pa dang
T02D2540:157b-38: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnams zad cing bral te
T02D2540:157b-39: rnam par rtog pas rnam par dbyer du med pa'i
T02D2540:157b-40: phyir tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2540:157b-42: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na //
T02D2540:157b-43: de la bdag po yod min yang //
T02D2540:158a-2: rnam las kyang ni chos ston 'byung //
T02D2540:158a-4: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu'i mchog ste rang bzhin la
T02D2540:158a-5: sogs pa'i tshul lugs mngon par brjod pa rnams kyi

T02D2540:164a-36: gcig pa nyid kyis 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'o
T02D2540:164a-37: byed pa'o // // rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:164a-38: rig sngags che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2540:164a-39: rig pa chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i gzugs can sngags kyi sku'o //
T02D2540:164b-0: de dang @164b mnyam par ldan ba'i phyir rig pa chen po ste /
T02D2540:164b-1: chen po yang yin la rig pa yang yin pas zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2540:164b-2: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ces te rig pa che mchog go //
T02D2540:164b-3: mgon po ni yang dag par gsungs pa'i lam nye
T02D2540:164b-4: bar ston pa'i 'gro ba rjes su 'khrid par byed
T02D2540:164b-5: pa ste / 'di ni kun rdzob tu'o //
T02D2540:164b-6: don dam par ni spros pa thams cad dang bral
T02D2540:164b-7: ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang gcig tu
T02D2540:164b-8: 'dres par gyur pa ni rig mchog chen pos te
T02D2540:164b-9: / rig pa chen po yang yin la mchog kyang yin zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2540:164b-10: sems can thams cad skyob pa'i don gyis mgon po'o //
T02D2540:164b-12: gsang sngags che ba'i don zhes pa ste /
T02D2540:164b-17: de d'i bdag nyid du rig pa gang yin pa
T02D2540:164b-18: de ni chen po yang yin la gsang sngags kyang
T02D2540:164b-19: yin pas gsang sngags te stong pa nyid dang snying
T02D2540:164b-20: rje dbyer med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D2540:164b-21: so // de nyid kyi phyir mchog ces pa ste gsang sngags che ba'i mchog go //
T02D2540:164b-22: de lta bu'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid
T02D2540:164b-23: can gyi gsang sngags chen po'i tshul ston pa'i phyir
T02D2540:164b-25: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni gsang sngags kyi tshul lo //
T02D2540:164b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yang de la gnas pas theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
T02D2540:164b-27: chos nyid kyi tshul gyis de'i rang bzhin nyid du
T02D2540:164b-28: gsungs pa ni chen po zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2540:164b-29: ste / ji srid theg pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du
T02D2540:164b-30: 'di yis mngon par 'dod pa thob par byed cing
T02D2540:164b-31: 'dren par byed pas phan tshun te lam mo //
T02D2540:164b-32: de gnyi ga'i tshul ni theg pa'i tshul te sems
T02D2540:164b-33: can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2540:164b-34: // chen po dang mchog ni thams cad las phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:164b-35: theg pa chen po'i tshul yang 'di yin la mchog kyang yin pas de ltar bshad do //
T02D2540:164b-36: lam dang 'bras bu dag don dam par dbye ba
T02D2540:164b-37: med kyang gdul bya la so sor snang ba'i dbang
T02D2540:164b-38: gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag 'dir
T02D2540:164b-40: don dam par ni sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad chen po rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid do //
T02D2540:165a-1: dang thugs rnams ni mi dge ba bcu las 'das
T02D2540:165a-2: shing yang dag par sdom pas thub ba chen po
T02D2540:165a-3: ste / de dang ldan pa'i phyir thub chen ldan no //
T02D2540:165a-4: sems can thams cad kyis gsang ba gsum gyi de
T02D2540:165a-5: kho na nyid shes par mdzad ba'i phyir thub pa
T02D2540:165a-6: chen po ste / tshig gnyis kyis bsod nams dang
T02D2540:165a-7: ye shes kyi tshogs dag gcig pa nyid du gsungs
T02D2540:165a-8: chen po ste / so // stong pa nyid sgom
T02D2540:165a-9: pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba'i gzugs kyi steng
T02D2540:165a-10: du rang gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2540:165a-11: lha'i gzugs su grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:165a-12: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba ste kun rdzob tu'o //
T02D2540:165a-13: don dam par ni lha dang sngags dag dbyer med pas na /
T02D2540:165a-14: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
T02D2540:165a-16: gsang sngags chen po'i tshul gang yin pa de ni
T02D2540:165a-17: de kho na'i bdag nyid can no zhes pa'i don
T02D2540:165a-18: to // pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i bdag po'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa ni /
T02D2540:165a-19: pha rol phyin bcu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:165a-20: gdul bya'i skye bo rjes su gzung ba'i don du
T02D2540:165a-21: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i rim gyis sbyin pa
T02D2540:165a-22: la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
T02D2540:165a-23: goms pa sngon du song bas byang chub thob par
T02D2540:165a-24: ston pas na pha rol phyin bcu thob pa'o //
T02D2540:165a-25: rang gi ngo bos ni de nyid gnyis su med
T02D2540:165a-26: pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang
T02D2540:165a-27: sems can rnams kyi don du pha rol tu phyin
T02D2540:165a-29: de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la gnas pa'o //
T02D2540:165a-30: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir /
T02D2540:165a-31: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
T02D2540:165a-32: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i sgra nyid do //
T02D2540:165a-33: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i tshul gnyis gas 'dren cing ston par byed pas na /
T02D2540:165a-34: de ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i tshul lo //
T02D2540:165a-35: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2540:165a-36: rang bzhin thob pa de'i rnam par smin par gyur
T02D2540:165a-37: pa rab tu dga' ba la sogs ba'i sa bcu
T02D2540:165a-38: po rnams su kun du rmongs pa dang gnas ngan
T02D2540:165a-39: len dang bral te gtso bo nyid thob pa'i phyir
T02D2540:165a-41: de nyid kyi phyir sa bcu po thob par 'dod
T02D2540:165a-42: pa'i sems can rnams 'khrid par byed pas na mgon
T02D2540:165b-0: po'o // sa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis @165b bzhugs pas na /
T02D2540:165b-1: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2540:165b-2: shes pa bcu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs pa /
T02D2540:165b-3: shes bcu zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la shes pa bcu ni /
T02D2540:165b-14: de rnams de'i bdag nyid du'am rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
T02D2540:165b-15: de rnams ni shes bcu rnam dag go //
T02D2540:165b-16: sgra ji bzhin shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D2540:165b-17: nyid ces bya ba ste de de bzhin pas na
T02D2540:165b-19: rnam pa bcu po zhes pa ni /
T02D2540:165b-20: bden pa rnam pa bcu po gang yin pa de kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T02D2540:165b-24: phye ste rtogs par byed pa'i dang /
T02D2540:165b-28: mi skye ba shes pa'i dang /
T02D2540:165b-29: lam la 'jug pa shes pa'i bden pa dang /
T02D2540:165b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun 'byung ba'i bden pa rnams so //
T02D2540:165b-31: de rnams ni rnam pa byed pas na rnam pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2540:165b-32: de la phye ste rtogs pa ni shes bya longs par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2540:165b-33: de yang mi slu ba'i phyir bden pa yin pas phye ste rtogs pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D2540:165b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi kun du 'byung
T02D2540:165b-35: ba'i bden pa ni chos kyi sprin dang de bzhin
T02D2540:165b-36: gshegs pa'i sa dag gi char gyur pa'o //
T02D2540:165b-38: de ltar bcu po de rnams don du gnyer bar
T02D2540:165b-39: bya ba yin pas don dang bsgrub pas bya ba'i
T02D2540:165b-40: ngo bo'i don gyi 'bras bu yin pas don bcu'i
T02D2540:165b-41: don to // yang na don bcu po de rnams
T02D2540:165b-42: sems can gyi rgyud la rdzogs par byed pa'i rang
T02D2540:165b-43: bzhin gyi don gyi rgyud yin pas na don bcu'i
T02D2540:165b-44: don zhes pa ste rang dang gzhan gyi don phun
T02D2540:165b-45: sum tshogs pa nyid bshad pa'o //
T02D2540:165b-46: nyan thos la sogs pa'i thub pa rnams kyi dbus
T02D2540:165b-47: na mchog gi dbang phyug dang ldan pa'i dbang por
T02D2540:165b-49: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang /
T02D2540:165b-50: stobs bcu po rnams gang zhe na /
T02D2540:166a-1: dang gnas ma yin pa dang /
T02D2540:166a-2: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2540:166a-5: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa dang /
T02D2540:166a-6: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam dang /
T02D2540:166a-11: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2540:166a-14: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D2540:166a-15: sngar bshad pa'i stobs rnams ni sa dgu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin par bshad la /
T02D2540:166a-16: 'dir slar yang bshad pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
T02D2540:166a-17: stobs bcu dang ldan pas thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na khyab bdag go //
T02D2540:166a-18: de'i phyir kun gyi don ni ma lus byed pa'o //
T02D2540:166a-28: chos rnams te rab tu dbye ba bcu po de
T02D2540:166a-29: rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam bcu dbang ldan no
T02D2540:166a-30: // dbang bcu po de rnams rang dbang du ldan pa'i phyir chen po'o //
T02D2540:166a-31: chos nyid kyi ngo bos yang dag par brjod pa'i
T02D2540:166a-32: phyir thog ma la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa
T02D2540:166a-33: gsungs te / sngar skye ba dgag pa'i skabs su thog ma med pa rab tu bsgrubs so //
T02D2540:166a-34: de nyid kyi phyir spros med bdag go //
T02D2540:166a-35: de la dag pa'i bdag gi gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
T02D2540:166a-36: de bzhin nyid bdag ces pa'o //
T02D2540:166a-37: ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i don gyi de kho na nyid ston pa po nyid du gsungs pa /
T02D2540:166a-38: yang dag ces pa la sogs pa ste yang dag pa ni chos kyi tshul lo //
T02D2540:166a-39: de kho na nyid de smra ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag smra ba'o //
T02D2540:166a-40: 'gro ba rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir 'tshang
T02D2540:166a-41: rgya bar bya'o zhes dam bcas pa de bzhin du
T02D2540:166a-42: rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir ji skad smra ba de
T02D2540:166a-43: bzhin byed pa'o // yang na ji ltar gzhan rnams
T02D2540:166a-44: la sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa dang
T02D2540:166a-45: ldan pa'i chos ston pa de bzhin du rang nyid
T02D2540:166a-46: kyang de la 'jug par byed pas na /
T02D2540:166a-47: ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed pa'o //
T02D2540:166a-48: ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2540:166b-0: rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i phyir @166b tshig gzhan
T02D2540:166b-1: med pa'o // gnyis ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D2540:166b-2: dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa ste
T02D2540:166b-3: med pa'o // / gang la gnyis yod pa ma yin pa de ni gnyis med do //
T02D2540:166b-4: ji ltar gnyis med pa yin zhe na /
T02D2540:166b-5: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D2540:166b-6: gnyis ni phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid
T02D2540:166b-9: gal te dngos po gang ltos grub //
T02D2540:166b-10: de nyid la yang ltos na ni //
T02D2540:166b-11: ltos bya gang yin de 'grub na //
T02D2540:166b-12: gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub //
T02D2540:166b-13: dngos po ltos 'grub gang yin pa //
T02D2540:166b-14: de ma grub na ji ltar ltos //
T02D2540:166b-15: ji ste grub pa ltos she na //
T02D2540:166b-16: de ni ltos par mi rigs so //
T02D2540:166b-18: ma ltos pa'i dngos po med pas chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
T02D2540:166b-19: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D2540:166b-21: gang phyir rten 'byung ma yin pa'i //
T02D2540:166b-22: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin pa //
T02D2540:166b-23: de phyir stong pa ma yin pa'i //
T02D2540:166b-24: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2540:166b-25: zhes rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i de
T02D2540:166b-26: bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
T02D2540:166b-27: ni gnyis su med par bshad de kun rdzob tu'o
T02D2540:166b-28: // don dam par ni gnyis su med par med cing gnyis kyang med pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:166b-29: ji ltar gnyis su med par gsung ba yin zhe na /
T02D2540:166b-30: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dang
T02D2540:166b-31: bral ba de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa
T02D2540:166b-32: dang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i tshig
T02D2540:166b-33: tu brjod pa dang bral ba'i phyir bden pa gsung
T02D2540:166b-34: ba yin gyi / rnam par rtog pa'i rjes su
T02D2540:166b-35: 'gro ba dang ldog pa byed pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin
T02D2540:166b-37: 'on kyang rgyu tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba ste /
T02D2540:166b-38: rgyu yang rgyu tsam du bya ba byed do //
T02D2540:166b-39: de bya ba dang bral du zin kyang yid bzhin
T02D2540:166b-40: gyi nor bu bzhin du gdul bya'i mngon par 'dod
T02D2540:166b-41: pa'i don mdzad par snang ste /
T02D2540:166b-42: rkyen las skyes pa la gnyis su med par gsungs pa zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D2540:166b-43: bcom ldan 'das gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02D2540:166b-44: khams gsum pa yang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du smra bar byed ces pa'i don to /
T02D2540:166b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gang //
T02D2540:167a-2: / zhes pa la sogs pa sngar bshad do //
T02D2540:167a-3: yang dag par zhes bya ba ni bden pa'o //
T02D2540:167a-4: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2540:167a-5: de las gzhan pa'i bden pa med pa'o //
T02D2540:167a-6: de la de'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par gnas pas na yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas pa'o /
T02D2540:167a-7: yang dag mtha' ni zhes klog pa ltar na /
T02D2540:167a-8: gang gi phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos kyi
T02D2540:167a-9: dbyings te de'i phyir de la rtag tu gnas so
T02D2540:167a-11: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i sems can gdul ba'i
T02D2540:167a-12: phyir bdag med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2540:167a-13: te / bdag dang bral bas bdag med pa ste gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa'o //
T02D2540:167a-14: dngos po bdag med pa la gsal bar byed cing
T02D2540:167a-15: seng ge bzhin du gzhan dag kun du skrag par
T02D2540:167a-16: byed pa'i sgra 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2540:167a-17: / bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan no //
T02D2540:167a-18: de nyid mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed de /
T02D2540:167a-19: mu stegs ngan pa'i lam dang ldan pa de rnams ni ri dags dang 'dra bas ri dags so //
T02D2540:167a-21: mu stegs ngan pa de rnams kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2540:167a-22: tshad ma dang 'gal bar bdag med pa nyid du khas len pa'o //
T02D2540:167a-23: de yang re zhig khams drug pa'i skyes bu ni med de /
T02D2540:167a-25: sa min chu me rlung ma yin //
T02D2540:167a-26: nam mkha' rnam shes skyes bu min //
T02D2540:167a-27: de rnams thams cad ma yin pa'i //
T02D2540:167a-28: gzhan pa'i skyes bu ci zhig yod //
T02D2540:167a-30: skyes bu zhes pa bdag go //
T02D2540:167a-31: nye bar len pa'i phung po yang de dag ma yin te /
T02D2540:167a-33: phung po bdag min de las gzhan //
T02D2540:167a-34: ma yin de la yod pa yin //
T02D2540:167a-35: me dang bud shing ltar 'dres min /
T02D2540:167a-36: de phyir phung po yod pa ci //
T02D2540:167a-37: zhes rnam par dpyad na yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D2540:167a-38: de yang gal te phung po rnams bdag yin na
T02D2540:167a-39: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i cha can du 'gyur te
T02D2540:167a-40: / phung po rnams ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:167a-41: de ltar re zhig phung po rnams bdag ma yin
T02D2540:167a-42: zhing phung po rnams las gzhan pa'ang ma yin no
T02D2540:167a-43: // gal te bdag phung po rnams las gzhan du gyur na /
T02D2540:167a-44: bdag dang phung po mtshan nyid mi mthun par 'gyur te /
T02D2540:167a-45: gang gi phyir phung po rnams ni skye ba dang
T02D2540:167b-0: gnas pa dang @167b 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir
T02D2540:167b-1: ro // bdag de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid du
T02D2540:167b-2: gyur na ni 'dus ma byas nyid kyi phyir bong
T02D2540:167b-3: bu'i rva bzhin mtshan nyid med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2540:167b-4: mtshan nyid med pas nam yang dngos po med de /
T02D2540:167b-5: bdag ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T02D2540:167b-6: bdag gi mtshan nyid med pas nga yir byed pa'ang med de /
T02D2540:167b-7: nga ni sbom po'o nga ni phra mo'o nga ni
T02D2540:167b-8: dkar po'o zhes pa yang phung po'i yul la sbyar
T02D2540:167b-9: ba de bzhin du nga yir byed pa sbom po
T02D2540:167b-10: dang phra mo'i rang bzhin gyi bdag kyang med do
T02D2540:167b-11: // bdag la phung po rnams med cing phung po rnams la'ang bdag med do //
T02D2540:167b-12: phung po rnams bdag dang ldan pa yang mi rigs so //
T02D2540:167b-13: 'di phyogs gsum gyi dbye bas yod par mi 'thad
T02D2540:167b-14: pa'i phyir de nyid dang gzhan gyi phyogs kyis dngos
T02D2540:167b-15: po lnga yang nang du 'dus pa nyid de /
T02D2540:167b-16: de ltar rnam pa lngas btsal ba na med pa'i phyir bdag med par grub pas /
T02D2540:167b-17: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D2540:167b-19: don dam par 'gro ba med kyang thams cad cig car gdul bya'i skye bo rnams las so //
T02D2540:167b-20: snang ba'i phyir kun du 'gro ba ste /
T02D2540:167b-21: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa ni chos 'ga'
T02D2540:167b-22: yod pa ma yin no zhes khyab par byed pa'i
T02D2540:167b-24: don yod stobs ni 'bras bu yod pa ste gdul
T02D2540:167b-25: bya rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par
T02D2540:167b-26: byed pa nyid kyis thams cad du khyab par byed
T02D2540:167b-27: pa gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
T02D2540:167b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid mgyogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2540:167b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs so //
T02D2540:167b-30: rgyal ba ni nang gi nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba ste bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2540:167b-31: sdig pa'i chos las nga rgyal te //
T02D2540:167b-32: de pas nyer 'gro nga rgyal bas //
T02D2540:167b-33: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bdud las rgyal bas na dgra rgyal lo //

T02D2540:174a-42: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis byang
T02D2540:174a-43: chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis
T02D2540:174b-0: sems can @174b gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams
T02D2540:174b-1: sangs la bzhag ces pa las so //
T02D2540:174b-3: 'di ni sangs rgyas sras po ste //
T02D2540:174b-4: sems can thams cad kyi don slar yang byang chub
T02D2540:174b-5: sems dpa'i don gyis rtag tu bzhugs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2540:174b-6: // sangs rgyas sras po yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na dam pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2540:174b-7: sems can gyi tshogs ma lus pa'i don byed pa'i
T02D2540:174b-8: mtshan nyid sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pas thugs
T02D2540:174b-9: las skyes pa'i sangs rgyas sras po zhes pa'i don
T02D2540:174b-10: to // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2540:174b-11: mchog ces pa ste shes rab kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin pa nyid du shes pa'o //
T02D2540:174b-12: de nyid srid pa skyed pa'i gnas te /
T02D2540:174b-13: de'i phyir mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'i sku 'byung
T02D2540:174b-14: ba gang yin pa ni shes rab srid 'byung ngo
T02D2540:174b-15: // de bzhin du skye gnas kyang srid pa dang
T02D2540:174b-16: las dang nyon mongs pa'i skye gnas dang bral ba'o
T02D2540:174b-18: chos kyi skye gnas zhes pa ste chos 'byung gi
T02D2540:174b-19: rang bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi skye gnas
T02D2540:174b-20: yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye gnas so //
T02D2540:174b-21: yang na chos kyi dbyings de rang bzhin gyi rgyu
T02D2540:174b-22: med pa'i phyir skye gnas ma yin pa nyid do
T02D2540:174b-23: zhes pa la'ang 'gal ba med do //
T02D2540:174b-24: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi chos ston
T02D2540:174b-25: pas srid pa mthar byed pa'i phyir mthar byed pa'o
T02D2540:174b-26: // de nyid ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2540:174b-27: gcig pu sra mkhregs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:174b-28: mkhregs pa ni khong stong ma yin pa'o //
T02D2540:174b-29: ji ltar mkhregs na gcig pu ste de bzhin nyid
T02D2540:174b-30: kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med pas cha
T02D2540:174b-31: shas med pa'o // gcig pu ni 'di rnams de bzhin nyid dang gnyis su med par gsungs pa'o //
T02D2540:174b-32: sra ba yang yin la thams cad kyi mchog kyang yin pas na gcig pu sra mkhregs so //
T02D2540:174b-33: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i bdag ste 'di'i bdag
T02D2540:174b-34: gi rang bzhin ni rdo rje'i bdag yin pas de
T02D2540:174b-35: ltar bshad do // gzugs kyi sku'i mchog la ni h'um mdzad rdo rje'i bdag yin te /
T02D2540:174b-36: de yang mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pas rdo rje'i bdag go //
T02D2540:174b-37: rdo rje mkhregs pa ni sra ba ste mi phyed pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:175a-1: thams cad la phul du byung ba'i phyir gtso bo'o //
T02D2540:175a-2: sra zhing brtan pa'i phyir gcig pu sra mkhregs so //
T02D2540:175a-3: yang na khong stong lta bu'i gnyis pa med pa'i
T02D2540:175a-4: phyir gcig pu gnyis su med pa nyid mkhregs pa
T02D2540:175a-5: ste de ni rang rig pa ma rtogs pas rig
T02D2540:175a-6: par bya ba med pas na gnyis med nyid de
T02D2540:175a-7: ; gnyis pa ni tshang ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir snying po med pa nyid de /
T02D2540:175a-8: de bas na rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i rang
T02D2540:175a-9: bzhin yin pa'i phyir rdo rje bdag 'jam dpal nyid
T02D2540:175a-10: de / rdo rje 'chang ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:175a-11: de'i phyir rdo rje h'um ni 'phral du skyes pa
T02D2540:175a-12: 'gro ba'i bdag ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu thu
T02D2540:175a-13: bo bzhin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D2540:175a-14: rang bzhin gyis skye ba med kyang kun rdzob tu nam mkha'o //
T02D2540:175a-15: stong pa nyid dang ye shes bdag nyid nam mkha'
T02D2540:175a-16: lta bu'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D2540:175a-17: kyi gzugs kyi sku las byung ba nyid nam mkha'
T02D2540:175a-18: las byung ba'o // gdul bya'i bsam ba'i dbang gis
T02D2540:175a-19: de dang de'i gzugs kyi snying rje chen pos rang
T02D2540:175a-20: byung bas na rang byung ngo //
T02D2540:175a-21: de lta na 'gro ba thams cad du song bas
T02D2540:175a-22: der gtogs pa'i skyon dang ldan par 'gyur bar dogs
T02D2540:175a-24: shes rab zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:175a-25: shes rab dang ye shes ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med par khong du chud pa ste /
T02D2540:175a-26: de nyid phung po la sogs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed pa'i phyir me'o //
T02D2540:175a-27: 'jig rten las 'das shing zhi ba shin tu rnam
T02D2540:175a-28: par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir
T02D2540:175a-29: chen po'o // de skad du yang ;
T02D2540:175a-30: 'gro ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni //
T02D2540:175a-31: rnam shes me yi bud shing 'dod //
T02D2540:175a-32: de dag ji bzhin rnam dpyad pas //
T02D2540:175a-33: 'bar zhing sreg pas nye bar zhi //
T02D2540:175a-35: de gnyis kyi phyir de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo'i
T02D2540:175a-36: rgyud la rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul gyis gsal
T02D2540:175a-37: bar byed pas na lam me ba ste rnam par
T02D2540:175a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos nyid kyis snang bar byed pas na 'od chen po'o //
T02D2540:175a-40: 'od chen po yang phyi rol gyi bems po lta
T02D2540:175a-41: bu ni nam yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i
T02D2540:175a-42: phyir gsungs pa / ye shes zhes bya ba la
T02D2540:175b-0: sogs pa @175b ste ye shes kyi snang ba rab
T02D2540:175b-1: tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang bas na
T02D2540:175b-2: ye shes kyi snang ba lam me ba'o //
T02D2540:175b-3: de ltar rnam par snang bar mdzad pa na nyi
T02D2540:175b-4: ma ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig snang bar byed
T02D2540:175b-5: dam / gal te thams cad du zhe na de nyid gcig pus zhes gsungs te /
T02D2540:175b-6: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes pa ste nyon mongs pa
T02D2540:175b-7: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir cig
T02D2540:175b-8: car 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gdul bya
T02D2540:175b-9: thams cad kyi rgyud la ye shes kyi snang ba
T02D2540:175b-10: 'char bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i mar me ste
T02D2540:175b-11: phyi rol gyi don ma yin no zhes pa'i don
T02D2540:175b-12: to // nam mkha'i khams thams cad snang bar byed
T02D2540:175b-13: pa'i ye shes nyid de'i bdag nyid du gsal bas
T02D2540:175b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2540:175b-16: sku nyid kyis sems can gyi phung po mtha' dag
T02D2540:175b-17: gi mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag rnam par
T02D2540:175b-18: 'joms pa'i phyir / gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2540:175b-19: da ni drag pos 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su
T02D2540:175b-20: gzung ba'i phyir gnod mdzes la sogs pa'i 'khor los
T02D2540:175b-21: sgyur ba'i sngags kyi lha rnams kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2540:175b-22: du gyur pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa
T02D2540:175b-23: / rig pa'i rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:175b-24: rig pa'i rgyal po ni gnod mdzes so //
T02D2540:175b-25: h'um yig bzhi pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sngags bdag dbang po'o //
T02D2540:175b-26: de nyid khro bo'i sngags kyi mnga' bdag yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:175b-27: gsang sngags rgyal po ste ghr'um yig go //
T02D2540:175b-28: de'i rang bzhin 'jam dpal te gsang sngags rgyal po'o //
T02D2540:175b-29: sems can gyi phung po chen po dang 'brel ba nyid kyis chen po'o //
T02D2540:175b-30: kun du snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi tshul gyis de
T02D2540:175b-31: dag gi don byed pa'i phyir don chen byed pa'o
T02D2540:175b-32: // yi ge gcig pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir gtsug tor chen po'o //
T02D2540:175b-33: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyon mongs pa sel ba'i phyir rmad byung gtsug tor ro //
T02D2540:175b-34: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces mtha' dag bklags pa na /
T02D2540:175b-35: rmad byung gtsug ces bya ba ni khro bo'i khyad par ro //
T02D2540:176a-0: mtha' dag bklags pa ni sde tshan nyid du yang dag par 'dod do zhes @176a * //
T02D2540:176a-2: gzi brjid phung po'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sna tshogs ston to //
T02D2540:176a-3: gtsug tor gyen du 'phags kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na nam mkha'i bdag po'o //
T02D2540:176a-4: gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi gtsug tor thams cad kyi
T02D2540:176a-5: bdag po nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun
T02D2540:176a-7: yang na gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du spyan ma la
T02D2540:176a-8: sogs pa rig ma'i dbus su mdzes pas rig pa'i
T02D2540:176a-9: rgyal po'o // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du de'i bdag
T02D2540:176a-10: po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir sngags drag gdab pa'o
T02D2540:176a-11: rgyal po'o // // chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang
T02D2540:176a-12: sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir
T02D2540:176a-14: de nyid kyi phyir don chen byad do //
T02D2540:176a-15: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bcu gnyis kyi gsang
T02D2540:176a-16: sngags kyi sngags rnams dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad
T02D2540:176a-17: par rmad du byung ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2540:176a-18: bzhugs pas na gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug
T02D2540:176a-19: go // 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du sna
T02D2540:176a-20: tshogs ston pa'i ngang tshul nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs
T02D2540:176a-21: go // ston to // nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil
T02D2540:176a-22: 'khor de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir nam mkha'i bdag go
T02D2540:176a-23: go // ston to // // rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2540:176a-24: chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D2540:176a-25: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2540:176a-26: pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas
T02D2540:176a-27: kun bdag dngos po mchog go //
T02D2540:176a-28: de ltar mnyam par lta bas 'gro ba rnams kun
T02D2540:176a-29: du dga' bar byed pa'i mig gang yin pa de
T02D2540:176a-31: gdul bya dang mthun pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs sprul par byed pa'i phyir sna tshogs gzugs can no //
T02D2540:176a-32: gdul bya so so skye bo rnams la 'dis sngon
T02D2540:176a-33: gyi rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan skyed par byed pa'i phyir
T02D2540:176a-34: skyed pa po'o // ngang ni sdud pa'o //
T02D2540:176a-35: de ni khams gsum pa'i bla ma'i yin pa'i phyir mchod cing brjed pa'o //
T02D2540:176a-36: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rnam pa
T02D2540:176a-37: thams cad du mngon sum du mdzad pas 'jig rten
T02D2540:176a-38: las 'das pa'i drang srong thams cad kyi dbus na
T02D2540:176a-39: mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir drang srong chen po'o //
T02D2540:176a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje dang padma zhes
T02D2540:176a-41: bya ba rigs gsum gyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid 'dzin
T02D2540:176b-1: rigs gsum gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'dzin pas gsang sngags ldan no //
T02D2540:176b-2: ma h'as ma ya ni grub pa'i mtha' thams cad
T02D2540:176b-3: kyi gsang sngags rab tu ston pa'i gtso bor gyur
T02D2540:176b-4: pa nyid kyis 'chang bar mdzad pas na /
T02D2540:176b-5: grub mtha' chen po'i gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02D2540:176b-7: yang na dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje'i tshul du rab tu ston pa'o //
T02D2540:176b-8: de rnams kyi gsang sngags ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D2540:176b-9: gcig pa'i ye shes te de 'chang bar mdzad pas
T02D2540:176b-10: na / dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags 'dzin no //
T02D2540:176b-11: dkon mchog gsum gyi don rab tu gsal bar mdzad
T02D2540:176b-12: cing rab tu ston pa la rag las pa nyid
T02D2540:176b-13: kyi phyir gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2540:176b-14: theg pa gsum ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi ste /
T02D2540:176b-15: theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba de dang de rnams
T02D2540:176b-16: la de lta de ltar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir
T02D2540:176b-17: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa pa'o //
T02D2540:176b-18: da ni 'jig rten gsum 'jigs par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2540:176b-19: 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs kyis bzhengs nas lha chen
T02D2540:176b-20: po la sogs pa lha khro ba rnams gdul ba'i
T02D2540:176b-21: phyir 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs can gyi
T02D2540:176b-22: bcom ldan 'das ni don yod zhags pa zhes bya
T02D2540:176b-24: skra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa'i mthar thug pas gsungs pa'o //
T02D2540:176b-25: sems can thams cad bkug nas theg pa chen po
T02D2540:176b-26: las mi g-yo bar byed pas don ston cing 'bras
T02D2540:176b-27: bu dang bcas pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D2540:176b-28: gyi zhags pa gang yin pa de ni don yod
T02D2540:176b-29: zhags pa'o // de nyid mu stegs dang bdud kyi
T02D2540:176b-30: dgra las rnam par rgyal ba'i ngang tshul nyid kyis
T02D2540:176b-32: de'i phyir byams pa'i zhags pas bkug nas dbang du
T02D2540:176b-33: gyur par bkod de sems can thams cad yang dag
T02D2540:176b-35: dbyer mi phyid pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang
T02D2540:176b-36: bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i zhags pa gang yin pa
T02D2540:176b-37: de ni 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags so
T02D2540:176b-38: // stobs kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2540:177a-0: sems can thams cad dgug pa dang @177a * //
T02D2540:177a-1: dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D2540:177a-2: gyi ye shes ni lcags kyu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir
T02D2540:177a-4: stobs kyis bkug pa'i sems can rnams thabs dang shes
T02D2540:177a-5: rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nges par sbyor
T02D2540:177a-7: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzugs kyis gdul dka' ba'i
T02D2540:177a-8: sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pas na rdo rje
T02D2540:177a-10: rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i gshin rje mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D2540:177a-11: de nyid kyi phyir khro bo'i rgyal po ste khro bo'i gtso bo'o //
T02D2540:177a-12: yang na khro bo nyid kyis mdzes shing gsal bas na khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2540:177a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rang bzhin gyis
T02D2540:177a-14: 'di'i zhal drug yin pas gdong drug ces bya ste
T02D2540:177a-15: / zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste //
T02D2540:177a-17: kha cig bzhad cing kha cig zhi //
T02D2540:177a-18: kha cig 'jigs par bgrad pa'i zhal //
T02D2540:177a-19: kha cig zhal ni gdangs pa ste //
T02D2540:177a-20: ljags kyang bskyod par mdzad pa dang //
T02D2540:177a-21: kha cig kyang ni mche ba gtsigs //
T02D2540:177a-24: mngon par shes pa drug gi rang bzhin dngos po
T02D2540:177a-25: ma lus pa mthong ba'i bdag nyid mi sdug cing
T02D2540:177a-26: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyan drug dpral ba'i phyogs na
T02D2540:177a-27: yod pa gang yin pa de ni mig drug go
T02D2540:177a-28: // sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang lha rnams dang skyabs zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2540:177a-29: rjes su dran pa drug gi rang bzhin phyag drug gang yin pa de ni lag drug go //
T02D2540:177a-30: dad pa la sogs pa'i stobs lnga dang ldan pa'i
T02D2540:177a-31: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab rnon po'i mche ba
T02D2540:177a-32: gtsigs pa'i tshems mthon po mnga' bas na mche ba
T02D2540:177a-33: gtsigs pa'o // mi mgo rlon dang skam po'o //
T02D2540:177a-34: yi dags phreng bas rnam brgyan pa //
T02D2540:177a-35: de lta'i mgon po bsgom par bya //
T02D2540:177a-37: keng rus kyi rgyan dang ldan pas keng rus so //
T02D2540:177a-38: mche ba gtsigs pa yang 'di yin la keng rus kyang ngo zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
T02D2540:177a-42: reg pa'i dug dang ldan te /
T02D2540:177a-43: me 'bar ba ltar dug 'bar zhing rnam par 'phro bas gzengs pa /
T02D2540:177b-1: lce shin tu bskyod cing glog ltar 'gyu ba /
T02D2540:177b-3: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i nor bu'i gdengs
T02D2540:177b-4: ka can gyi glu chen po rnams ni ha l'a
T02D2540:177b-6: de rnams kyis skra bcings pa dang /
T02D2540:177b-15: rgyan rnams su byas pa'i phyir ha l'a ha la
T02D2540:177b-16: rnams kyi grangs brgya snyed kyi gdong rnams gang la
T02D2540:177b-17: yod pa ni / ha l'a ha la gdong brgya pa ste gshin rje kho na mthar byed pa'o //
T02D2540:177b-18: de yang mthar byed cing 'dzin par byed 'dul bar byed pas na gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D2540:177b-19: yang na gshin rje'i sgra ni gnyis la brjod de /
T02D2540:177b-20: de mthar byed pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos bstan pas 'joms pa na de ltar bshad do //
T02D2540:177b-21: sems can rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi khyad par 'joms par byed pa ni bgegs so //
T02D2540:177b-22: de'i gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyi phyir bgegs kyi
T02D2540:177b-23: rgyal po ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
T02D2540:177b-24: gnas pa'i bgegs rnams med par byed pa'o //
T02D2540:177b-25: gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir thogs pa med
T02D2540:177b-26: pa yid ltar mgyogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon
T02D2540:177b-27: du phyogs par byed pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog go
T02D2540:177b-28: // gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir 'jigs byed pa'o //
T02D2540:177b-29: khams gsum pa shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra
T02D2540:177b-30: sgrogs pas grags pa yang 'di yin la mi phyed
T02D2540:177b-31: pa nyid kyis rdo rje yang 'di yin pas rdo
T02D2540:177b-32: rje grags pa'o // yang na skrags pa rnam pa mang po'i sgra ni grags pa yin la /
T02D2540:177b-33: de nyid mi phyed pa 'joms pa'i phyir rdo rje
T02D2540:177b-34: ste de lta bu gang yin pa ni rdo rje
T02D2540:177b-35: grags pa'o // thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi phyir rdo rje snying ngo //
T02D2540:177b-36: rdo rje khro bo'i gzugs kyis sgyu ma sprul lo //
T02D2540:177b-37: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa'i phyir sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'o //
T02D2540:177b-38: yang na sgyu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin nyid rdo rje
T02D2540:177b-39: ste khams gsum stong pa nyid kyi ye shes gang
T02D2540:177b-40: yin pa de sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'o //
T02D2540:177b-41: gang gi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kho na rdo rje zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2540:178a-0: gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pas na gsus bo @178a * //
T02D2540:178a-2: / yang na chen po ni dri ma med cing mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' yin la /
T02D2540:178a-3: gsus pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi
T02D2540:178a-4: rang bzhin khams gsum pa'i khong ste de gang yin
T02D2540:178a-5: pa de la de ltar bshad do //
T02D2540:178a-6: rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje'i bdag go //
T02D2540:178a-7: yang na rigs ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
T02D2540:178a-8: rdo rje ste 'dod pa 'byung bar byed pas rdo
T02D2540:178a-9: rje'i bdag go // byang chub kyi sems kyi rang
T02D2540:178a-10: bzhin gyi rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2540:178a-11: 'byung ba'i phyir rdo rje skye gnas so //
T02D2540:178a-12: yang na rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2540:178a-13: de ni skye gnas te gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid las sems can rnams 'byung ba'o //
T02D2540:178a-14: yang na sangs rgyas sras po nyid kyis rdo rje
T02D2540:178a-15: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skye gnas gang yin
T02D2540:178a-16: pa ste zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
T02D2540:178a-17: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje snying po ni rdo
T02D2540:178a-18: rje nyid khu ste me long lta bu la sogs
T02D2540:178a-19: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje rnams ni
T02D2540:178a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nying khu ste snying
T02D2540:178a-22: dngos po thams cad la go skabs sbyin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2540:178a-23: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis nyes pa thams cad kyis ma gos pas na nam mkha' 'dra ba'o //
T02D2540:178a-24: sa phyis pas ni nges pa'i tshig go //
T02D2540:178a-25: de nyid kyi phyir de las skyes pa ni chos
T02D2540:178a-26: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las mi g-yo bas na
T02D2540:178a-27: mi g-yo ba'o // yang na nam mkha' lta bu
T02D2540:178a-28: de yang snying rje chen pos rjes su chags pas
T02D2540:178a-29: sems can thams cad kyi don las mi g-yo ba'i
T02D2540:178a-31: hi ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D2540:178a-32: ral pa rnams bsgyings pa ni nam mkhar rnam par 'phags pa'i ral pa'i tshogs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:178a-33: gcig ni mi mnyam pa'i ral pa bsgyings pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2540:178a-34: yang na khro bo ral pa gcig pa'i gzugs kyis khyab pas bsgyings pa ste /
T02D2540:178a-35: gdul dka' ba rnams kun du 'joms par rtsom pa
T02D2540:178a-36: gang yin pa de ni ral pa gcig bsgyings pa'o
T02D2540:178a-37: // tshogs kyi bdag po'i glang po'i pags pa rlon
T02D2540:178a-38: pa'i na bza' 'chang bas na glang chen ko rlon
T02D2540:178a-40: rlon bcas glang po'i pags pa'i gos 'chang ba //
T02D2540:178a-42: gdug cing gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir
T02D2540:178b-0: 'jig rten gsum kun @178b du skyod par byed pa
T02D2540:178b-1: h'a h'a dang / h'i h'i'i rang bzhin gyi sgra
T02D2540:178b-2: chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i sngags kyi dbyangs skad
T02D2540:178b-3: gsang mthon pos sgrogs pas na /
T02D2540:178b-4: drag chen h'a h'a zhes sgrogs pas //
T02D2540:178b-5: h'i h'i zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
T02D2540:178b-6: ces pa ste h'i h'i zhes sgrogs pa yang 'di
T02D2540:178b-7: yin la 'jigs par byed pa yang yin pas zhes
T02D2540:178b-9: de nyid kyis thams cad kun du skrag pa skyed pa'i phyir shin tu ba'i don te /
T02D2540:178b-10: chen po yin la gad mo yang yin pas gad mo chen po gad rgya ngas can no //
T02D2540:178b-11: de gnyen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzhig par dka'
T02D2540:178b-12: ba 'jig par byed pa'i gad mo dang ldan pas
T02D2540:178b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gad mo'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyir cher sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2540:178b-15: rnam par dpyad pa'i rdo rjes so sor 'joms shing
T02D2540:178b-16: dbyer mi phyed pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir
T02D2540:178b-18: de yang brtse bas mtha' gcig tu sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ram /
T02D2540:178b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems
T02D2540:178b-20: dpa' rdo rje legs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir
T02D2540:178b-22: rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir mi phyed pa'i gzugs kyis mdzes pa'am /
T02D2540:178b-23: rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2540:178b-24: mchog tu phul du byung zhing lhun gyis grub pa'i bde ba 'byung ba'i ngo bor gyur pa'am /
T02D2540:178b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chags pa'i gzugs nyid kyi phyir bde ba che'o //
T02D2540:178b-26: sems can shin tu gtum po rnams gdul bar bya
T02D2540:178b-27: ba'i phyir drag cing gzhig par dka' ba'i gzugs 'dzin
T02D2540:178b-28: par mdzad pas na rdo rje gtum po'o //
T02D2540:178b-29: gdul bya'i sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2540:178b-30: rang nyid kyang dga' ba'i bdag nyid can du gyur pas na dga' ba che'o //
T02D2540:178b-31: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2540:178b-32: kyi gzugs kyis sa thams cad du khyab bar h'um
T02D2540:178b-33: zhes sgrogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni /
T02D2540:178b-34: rdo rje h'um mdzad h'um zhes sgrogs so //
T02D2540:178b-35: khams gsum na gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las
T02D2540:178b-36: rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i phyir go cha chen
T02D2540:178b-37: po bgos te / mi phyed pa'i mda' dang gzhu
T02D2540:178b-38: 'dzin pa'i phyir mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa'o
T02D2540:179a-0: po bgos te / // nye bar dmigs pa'i mi shes pa @179a * //
T02D2540:179a-1: ma lus pa gcod pa'i phyir rdo rje ral gri'o //
T02D2540:179a-2: de nyid kyi phyir mi shes pa bcad nas sems
T02D2540:179a-3: can gyi don rnams ma lus pa la byang chub
T02D2540:179a-4: kyi lam gyi dgra nyon mongs pa ma lus pa
T02D2540:179a-5: bcad de ye shes khyad par du byed pas na
T02D2540:179a-6: ma lus gcod kyi sgra las ni zhi bar gyur
T02D2540:179a-7: par rtag go // rdo rje las kyi rang bzhin
T02D2540:179a-8: nyid kyis rdo rje rtse mo bcu gsum pa 'dzin
T02D2540:179a-9: par mdzad pas na rdo rje kun 'chang ngo //
T02D2540:179a-10: de'i phyir rdo rje can zhes bya ste /
T02D2540:179a-11: ni tya yo ge pra sam sh'a y'a mb'a ma tva th'i ya:/
T02D2540:179a-12: de nyid rdo rje'i gtso bo dang ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje gcig pu'o //
T02D2540:179a-13: de nyid kyi phyir g-yul sel ba'o //
T02D2540:179a-14: 'thab par byed 'khrug par byed pas na g-yul te
T02D2540:179a-15: nyon mongs pa ste rang bzhin gyi rgyud du gtogs
T02D2540:179a-16: pa de rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis
T02D2540:179a-17: sel bar byed 'dor bar byed zlog par byed pas
T02D2540:179a-18: na sel ba'o // kha santo ni p'a ta: rdo
T02D2540:179a-19: rje 'bar bas kha rnam par gyes pa shin tu
T02D2540:179a-20: drag cing dmar la ser skya dang dmar ser gyi
T02D2540:179a-21: spyan mi bzad pa gang la mnga' ba de ni
T02D2540:179a-22: rdo rje 'bar ba mi bzad do //
T02D2540:179a-23: rdo rje 'bar ba dang rdo rje me dang rdo
T02D2540:179a-24: rje nyi ma ste khro ba'i gzugs 'bar zhing 'phro
T02D2540:179a-25: bas gcig tu drag po'i bka' dang ldan pa'i phyir
T02D2540:179a-26: mgo skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste zhes pa'o //
T02D2540:179a-27: rdo rje rnam par dag pas lhag par so sor
T02D2540:179a-28: rtog pa chos thams cad la 'bebs pas na rdo
T02D2540:179a-29: rje 'bebs pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir 'di 'bebs pa chen po yin pas 'bebs pa chen po'o //
T02D2540:179a-30: nam mkha' sgron ma la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2540:179a-31: dang ldan pa'i phyir sgom pa bzhin du 'phro ba'i
T02D2540:179a-32: mig grangs brgya gang yin pa de ni mig brgya
T02D2540:179a-33: pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir de rnams rdo rje
T02D2540:179a-34: me ltar 'bar ba'i spyan du gyur pa gang yin
T02D2540:179a-35: pa de ni rdo rje'i mig go /
T02D2540:179a-36: yang na rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D2540:179a-37: shes te de 'di'i yin pas de ltar bshad do
T02D2540:179a-38: // rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ba spu gang
T02D2540:179a-39: yin pa de rnams ni rengs shing rno ba'i phyir
T02D2540:179a-40: myu gu lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de
T02D2540:179a-41: ni rdo rje ba spu'i myu gu'o //
T02D2540:179a-42: de ltar gyur pa'i lus gang yin pa de ni rdo rje ba spu'i myu gu'i lus so //
T02D2540:179a-43: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa rdo rje'i spu ni zhes pa'o //
T02D2540:179a-44: de yang gcig pu ste gnyis su med pas 'jigs
T02D2540:179a-45: byed chen po dang mi'i seng ge la sogs pa
T02D2540:179a-46: zil gyis gnon pa'i lus can te /
T02D2540:179b-0: de @179b 'di'i sku yin pas na lus gcig pu'o //
T02D2540:179b-1: rdo rje rtse mo ni rdo rje ltar sra ba'i
T02D2540:179b-2: rtse mo gang yin pa'i sen mo ste sen mos
T02D2540:179b-3: brtsams pa ste / gdug pa can rnams nye bar
T02D2540:179b-4: rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rtse
T02D2540:179b-5: mo sen mos brtsams zhes pa'o //
T02D2540:179b-6: gzhig par dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D2540:179b-7: sra zhing mkhregs pa'i pags pa ste /
T02D2540:179b-8: pags pa'i dbang po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs so //
T02D2540:179b-9: dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs bzhin dpral ba'i steng du phreng
T02D2540:179b-10: bas dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo ni rdo rje phreng
T02D2540:179b-11: ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pas na rdo rje phreng thogs so //
T02D2540:179b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyir dpal ldan no //
T02D2540:179b-13: rdo rje de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02D2540:179b-14: de'i rang bzhin gyi rgyan rnams kyis gnas ji lta bar brgyan pas de ltar bshad do //
T02D2540:179b-15: gdug pa'i rgyud gnon pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum gyis
T02D2540:179b-16: bskyod du med pa'i h'a h'a zhes bya ba sgrogs
T02D2540:179b-17: pa'i rang bzhin don shin tu thos pas 'dul bar
T02D2540:179b-18: byed pa'i phyir drag tu bzhad pa gang yin pa
T02D2540:179b-19: de ni gad rgyangs h'a h'a'o //
T02D2540:179b-20: chos kyi de nyid phyin ci ma log par nges par sgrogs par byed pas na nges sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2540:179b-21: rdo rje sngags kyi tshul gyis sgra sgrogs pas rdo rje'i sgra'o //
T02D2540:179b-22: aom w'a kye dam na ma:/
T02D2540:179b-23: aom w'a g'i shva ra mu:/
T02D2540:179b-26: zhes pa ste yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir de nyid yi ge drug ma'o //
T02D2540:179b-27: 'jam pa ni skrag pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:179b-28: yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgras chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D2540:179b-29: de nyid kyi chos thams cad bdag med par gsal
T02D2540:179b-30: bar byed pas 'gro ba la khyab pa'i chos kyi
T02D2540:179b-31: sgra sgrogs pas sgra che ba'o //
T02D2540:179b-32: de'i phyir 'jig rten gsum na gcig pa ste /
T02D2540:179b-33: gnyis su med pa'i sgra tshangs pa'i dbyangs gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra'o //
T02D2540:179b-34: de nyid kyi phyir sgra gcig pu des sems can
T02D2540:179b-35: gyi phung po chen po la chos ston pa'i bya
T02D2540:179b-36: ba byed pa'i phyir chen po'o //
T02D2540:179b-38: gsung gcig nyid du gsungs pa yang //
T02D2540:179b-39: du ma nyid du mtshon par byed //
T02D2540:179b-40: de ltar dam pas bstan pa ni //
T02D2540:180a-3: che ba nyid ni nam mkha' ma lus ba khyab
T02D2540:180a-4: pa'i dbyangs nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug
T02D2540:180a-5: sgra'o // de'i phyir sgra dang ldan pa rnams te
T02D2540:180a-6: ngag gi dbang po nyid du mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2540:180a-7: can gang yin pa rnams kyi mchog ste gtso bo'o
T02D2540:180a-8: sgra'o // // de nyid kyi phyir 'jam dpal dbyangs so zhes gsungs so /
T02D2540:180a-10: // / da ni chos de kho na nyid la sogs
T02D2540:180a-11: pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan rnams tshigs
T02D2540:180a-12: su bcad pa tsam drug gis yang dag par brjod
T02D2540:180a-13: de / yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2540:180a-14: yang dag mtha' ste de bzhin zhes pa la /
T02D2540:180a-15: tshig 'di rnams ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam grangs
T02D2540:180a-16: nyid kyi phyir don gcig kyang tshig so so ba'o
T02D2540:180a-17: // don gcig tshig gang gis ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D2540:180a-18: thams cad kyis thams cad kyi don rtogs par bya ste /
T02D2540:180a-19: de lta bu ni de ltar gzhan du yang ji ltar rigs pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2540:180a-20: de yang thams cad kyi tshe de bzhin kho na nyid pas de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2540:180a-25: yang dag pa'i de nyid dang /
T02D2540:180a-26: de'i mtha'i mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2540:180a-27: de las gzhan pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:180a-28: yi ge thams cad kyis brjod du med pas na yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2540:180a-29: 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub ste /
T02D2540:180a-30: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong
T02D2540:180a-31: pa nyid smra ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pas na
T02D2540:180a-33: de nyid kyi phyir khyu mchog ste /
T02D2540:180a-34: rgol ba thams cad kyi gtso bo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:180a-35: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
T02D2540:180a-36: zhes thams cad klag pa na nyi tshe ba phyin
T02D2540:180a-37: ci log gi stong pa nyid smra ba'i mu stegs
T02D2540:180a-38: pa rnams kyi gtso bo zhes rnam par bshad do
T02D2540:180a-39: // de ltar stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog
T02D2540:180a-40: nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
T02D2540:180a-41: ldan pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2540:180a-42: ci ma log pa'i stong pa nyid kyi chos ston
T02D2540:180a-43: pa ni zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2540:180a-44: phyin ci log gi stong pa nyid kyi chos bstan pa ni /
T02D2540:180a-45: sems can rnams slu ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D2540:180a-47: stong pa nyid la lta nyes na //
T02D2540:180b-0: shes rab cung rnams phung @180b bar 'gyur //
T02D2540:180b-1: ji ltar sprul la bzung nyes dang //
T02D2540:180b-2: rig sngags nyes par bsgrubs pa bzhin //
T02D2540:180b-4: chos ma lus pa'i ston pa'i chos kyi sgra rnams
T02D2540:180b-5: rdzogs pa'i chos kyi dung gi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2540:180b-7: chos kyi dung ste sgra can ldan //
T02D2540:180b-9: de la chos kyi dung gi ting nge 'dzin ni 'di yin te /
T02D2540:180b-10: chu'i dkyil 'khor bdun po dkar po'i steng du padma
T02D2540:180b-11: 'dab ma brgyad pa ga sar dang bcas ba'i lte
T02D2540:180b-12: bar chos thams cad ni 'chi ba dang bral ba'o
T02D2540:180b-13: zhes pa / gsal bar byed pa'i mam gi sa
T02D2540:180b-14: bon las byung ba'i bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi gzugs
T02D2540:180b-16: rdo rje skyil krung gi steng du phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du gnas pa /
T02D2540:180b-17: gzhon nu'i rgyan can zur phud lnga pa /
T02D2540:180b-18: dangs shing dri ma med pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02D2540:180b-19: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i steng du padma la yi ge kham las dung /
T02D2540:180b-20: de'i dbus su aom badzra dzi hva ram zhes pas rdo rje'i lce /
T02D2540:180b-21: lce'i steng du rin po che'i padma la ting nge
T02D2540:180b-22: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
T02D2540:180b-23: med do // de'i steng rkan yi ge bam las
T02D2540:180b-24: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa thur du khar 'dzags par gyur
T02D2540:180b-25: te de lta bu'i rim pas zla ba phyed dam
T02D2540:180b-26: med do // / zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2540:180b-27: zla ba drug gi bar du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2540:180b-28: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnyed pa dang dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02D2540:180b-29: phyi rol du gru bzhi sgo bzhi ba /
T02D2540:180b-30: sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa phyi'i
T02D2540:180b-31: dkyil 'khor du lha mo sge ga mo dang phreng
T02D2540:180b-32: ba ma dang glu ma dang gar ma dang me
T02D2540:180b-33: tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma
T02D2540:180b-34: dang dri chab ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2540:180b-35: de'i nang zlum po dkar po re kh'a gcig gis bskor ba sgo med pa'o //
T02D2540:180b-36: de'i dbus su padma dkar po ste /
T02D2540:180b-37: de lta bu bris nas ston zla tha chungs sam /
T02D2540:180b-39: dpyid zla tha chungs la sogs pa'i zla ba nya
T02D2540:180b-40: ba la mchod pa dbul ba la sogs pa sngon
T02D2540:180b-41: du 'gro bas gtor ma phul te /
T02D2540:180b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje skyil krung gis 'dug nas mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02D2540:180b-43: bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi gzugs yongs su gyur pa
T02D2540:180b-44: las sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa sku chos
T02D2540:180b-45: kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'od gsal ba nyid du
T02D2540:181a-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku

T02D2540:191a-28: bzhin rnam par dag pa zad pa dang mi skye

T02D2540:191a-30: pa'i don to // de nyid rang dang gzhan gyi
T02D2540:191a-31: rgol ba rnams kyis rgyal bar mi nus pas na

T02D2540:191a-39: rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //

T02D2540:191a-42: 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen dag las grol bas na gsal byed min no //
T02D2540:191a-43: cha shas med pa'i phyir cha med do //
T02D2540:191b-0: rang bzhin med pa nyid @191b kyis thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir kun 'gro'o //
T02D2540:191b-1: de nyid kyi phyir khyab pa po zhes gsungs so //

T02D2540:191b-3: su yang thim pa nyid rnal 'byor pa nyid rnams

T02D2540:191b-6: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'o //

T02D2540:191b-12: rdul med ces pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D2540:191b-14: rdul gyi sgra ni de 'dra ba'i don dang /
T02D2540:191b-15: rdul gyi sgra ni aa yig gi mthar ji lta bar de lta bu yong /

T02D2540:191b-19: lo // bag chags dang bag la nyal gyi dri

T02D2540:191b-22: phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan
T02D2540:191b-23: len gyi bag chags kyi skyon spangs pa'i phyir nyes
T02D2540:191b-24: pa spangs pa'o // nad du gyur pa'i bdag dang

T02D2540:191b-26: sbyor ba dang bral bas na skyon med pa'o //
T02D2540:191b-27: sngags kyi tshul la ni tshig lnga pos mngon par
T02D2540:191b-28: byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ston par byed do
T02D2540:191b-29: // de yang aom tsitta pra ti bedham ka ro mi /
T02D2540:191b-30: zhes pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rdul dang bral
T02D2540:191b-31: ba me long ltar dang ba'i sems mtshams sbyor rtogs
T02D2540:191b-32: par byed pas na rdul med do //
T02D2540:191b-33: ha yig skyes zhes par k'a'i sgra nges pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid kyis phyis pa'o //
T02D2540:191b-34: shes rab a'a li zla ba'i gzugs //
T02D2540:191b-36: / aom bo dhi tsitta mu ta p'a da y'a
T02D2540:191b-37: mi zhes dri ma med pa'i 'od zer zla ba'i
T02D2540:191b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyis mnyam nyid dri ma med
T02D2540:191b-39: cing rdul dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D2540:191b-40: rnam par snang bar byed pa las skyes pa zhes
T02D2540:191b-41: par nges pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi rdul dang
T02D2540:192a-0: bral ba'o // k'a li thabs dang zla ba'i gzugs @192a * //
T02D2540:192a-2: aom tishtha badzra badzr'atma ko& ham /
T02D2540:192a-3: zhes pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo
T02D2540:192a-4: rje rtse mo lnga pa'i gzugs kyis sor rtog pa
T02D2540:192a-5: ste / mu stegs rnam pa tha dad pa'i dregs
T02D2540:192a-6: pa'i dri ma rnams 'joms pa'i phyir dri ma med
T02D2540:192a-7: ste / pa'o // aom sa manta bh'a aa ham /
T02D2540:192a-8: zhes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D2540:192a-9: pa'i kun du bzang po'i gzugs spros te bya ba

T02D2540:192a-16: gyi nad las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir skyon med

T02D2540:192a-19: khong du chud pa'i phyir shin tu rab sad do

T02D2540:192a-29: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
T02D2540:192a-30: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rnam par
T02D2540:192a-31: shes pa'i chos nyid 'das zhes pa ste /

T02D2540:192a-33: las dang bya ba'i rang gi rnam par shes pas
T02D2540:192a-34: brtags pa'i chos nyid dag ni rnam par shes pa'i

T02D2540:192a-36: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te rnam par rtog
T02D2540:192a-37: pa las 'das zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:192a-38: de ltar na bems po yod par 'gyur bar dogs pa la gsungs pa /

T02D2540:192a-40: zhes pa ste gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:192a-41: de ltar rnam par rtog pa med kyang skyob pa rnams chos ston pa ni dpyad par bya ste /
T02D2540:192a-42: sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i dbang gis yid
T02D2540:192a-43: bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin no zhes de ltar bshad
T02D2540:192a-44: do // de nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba
T02D2540:192b-0: @192b dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rtog med lhun
T02D2540:192b-1: do // gyis grub pa'o // de ni dus gsum

T02D2540:192b-4: do // gyis grub pa'o // las byed pa'o //
T02D2540:192b-5: de gcig pus cig car dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas

T02D2540:192b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
T02D2540:192b-9: chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa ste /

T02D2540:192b-19: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2540:192b-20: sangs rgyas thog ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D2540:192b-25: de nyid kyang don dam sangs rgyas te /

T02D2540:192b-28: gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa //

T02D2540:192b-30: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
T02D2540:192b-31: sangs rgyas chos nyid blta bar bya //
T02D2540:192b-32: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02D2540:192b-33: chos nyid shes par bya min pas //

T02D2540:192b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2540:192b-36: thog ma nas de lta bu'i chos nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D2540:192b-37: de nyid gang las kyang skye ba med pas na rgyu med pa'o //
T02D2540:192b-38: thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes nyid gcig pu

T02D2540:192b-40: pa de ni ye shes mig gcig go //
T02D2540:192b-41: sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
T02D2540:192b-42: chos thams cad de'i bdag nyid du thim zhing brgyal
T02D2540:192b-43: bar gyur pa de ni 'dir lus rnam pa thams

T02D2540:193a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //

T02D2540:200b-21: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //

T02D2540:200b-31: gzhan du sa'i dkyil 'khor ni sa'i snying po ste

T02D2540:201a-0: @201a * // 'di dag kyang gar gyis 'dul ba'i skye po rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //

T02D2540:201a-11: can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de

T02D2540:201a-23: bo gzhug pa'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
T02D2540:201a-24: tshul gyis dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de

T02D2540:201a-26: don dam par ni stong pa nyid la dga' ba'o //
T02D2540:201a-28: mchog gi blo ste blo'i mchog 'jam pa'i dpal lo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2540:201a-29: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2540:201a-30: srid pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D2540:201a-32: dang gzugs med ba rnams la 'ga' zhig mtha' par

T02D2540:201a-36: so // sogs kyi sgras 'dul ba'i khams las byung ba'i 'dod chags kyang gzung ngo //
T02D2540:201a-37: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kun nas zhes
T02D2540:201a-38: pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa de
T02D2540:201a-39: las 'das pa'o // de nyid kyang ste shes rab
T02D2540:201b-0: kyi khyad par de @201b nyid dran pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2540:201b-1: las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2540:201b-2: rtags kyi khyad par nyid kyis de nyid ces pa'i don to //

T02D2540:201b-7: ba'i dran pa'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin brgya stong
T02D2540:201b-8: gi bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis mdzes pas de

T02D2540:201b-10: ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi yan lag

T02D2540:201b-15: ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D2540:201b-16: de rnams ni shin tu dga' bar 'os pa nyid kyi phyir me tog lta bu ste /

T02D2540:201b-41: gcig tu kun du chags pa nyid kyi phyir sems
